reviewText:
THIS GAME IS HARD!!!

And that's not a bad thing. It really reminds me of gaming back in the old days where completing a mission gives immense satisfaction and starting a more difficult mission gives you a little bit of dreadfulness.

Art style is brilliany and refreshing. Definately a game I'll enjoy playing stoned.

reviewText: Interesting and unique; as well as visually pleasing. I'm still learning but I can see myself sinking a few hours into this one!

reviewText: Game has great art-style and great challenge.\n\nIt's not the perfect game and I'm looking forward to updates but, it's something new and refreshing.

reviewText: Awesome and addictive! I got so immersed in the game and it reminded me of the time I watched Interstellar and The Martian. The depiction of space was amazing. Fantastic artwork and gameplay!!

reviewText:
Never thought space could be simulated so in 2D. Controls are tough and the journey even tougher, Frustrating at times, completing missions gives a feeling of satisfaction, even to the point of bragging rights.

The game brings back nostalgia when spoon feeding gamers were never in game design and players were treated intelligently. Not to mention the wonderful art style and soundtracks, The feeling of isolation like Gravity is always looming as I play.

I would love to see a leaderboard if possible.

reviewText: Handles well once you used to the physics. nice colour palet and looks very clean.
voteText: 2 of 5 people (40%) found this review helpful

reviewText: This games looks wonderful and is fun to play but also very difficult and frustrating at times because the controls are so sensitive at least for me it is. I couldn't even finish the tutorial lol but I did manage to finish the first level after so many tries and on the attempt that I actually completed it, I wasn't even trying to beat it, but when I did it felt so rewarding and such an acomplishment.\n\nVIOLET: Space Mission is clearly made for a touchscreen device such as a phone or tablet, hence the challenging controls on PC, but it does make for a fun game to pass time. Though, I would highly suggest to get it on sale.

reviewText:
PROS:
-great style
-2d animation and character art is pretty good
-awesome setting
-challenging

CONS:
-frustrating
-some of the challenges are super unfair
-clearly a mobile port
-gets very repetitive

overall: 5/10

reviewText: This looked like a cool mix of subspace and the martian and gravity.  Definitely my kind of game.  It doesn't do a great job of it though.  It's very very frustrating to play and it looks like it was made for a phone or tablet which it clearly was.
